title: My friend cannot log in
body:
He just tries to login on his computer into League, but it doesn't work. I think it says 'the servers can't service your logon request'.
But this doesn't happen when on the he logs on on my computer, even when we are on the same internet.
Please help, I really want to play with him on LOL.

replies.body:
Your friend should go through the steps here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

If that doesn't work, he will likely have to submit a ticket to Player Support detailing the problem so they can help further: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new (Having logs from the Hextech Repair Tool will help greatly with this)
